attributes.action: Ban Sodium Fluoride from our tap water
attributes.additional_details: Fluoride has been seen to cause alot of diseases such as cancer. https://fluoridealert.org/issues/health/ check it out for yourselves via the link above. Sodium fluoride is mostly found in the pineal gland after being indigested, which leads to a lowered IQ of the person consuming it. Unfortunately, the damaged caused by sodium fluoride can not be reversed. However we can stop making it worse and avoid the affects by stopping drinking it everyday in our tap water.
attributes.background: Sodium Fluoride is not natural, it is man made. Do not get this mixed up with calcium fluoride which is natural and can be found in soil. Sodium fluoride has not been scientificly tested for long term affects or if it even helps prevent tooth decay like we get told it does.
